RelatedSentence: A 25 - year - old Bronx resident is due in court on the Mohawk reservation along the Canadian border to answer drug charges after police say he was stopped with almost 66 pounds of marijuana in his car .

St. Regis Mohawk Tribal Police say in a news release that Raymond Loraespinosa faces charges of criminal possession of marijuana and a traffic violation after he was pulled over in the town of Hogansburg on May 10 .
